text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
text_block_list.text:
Oh, Trainer.
It's wonderful that you came!

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text: Welcome! Here, we keep various records related to the training of the Umamusume in an archive.

text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text: For example, the daily lives spent with them, or the demanding days of training together—
By accumulating more memories, the archive's level will also increase.
text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa

text_block_list.text: Furthermore, we have also prepared rewards corresponding to the level, so you should strive to do your best!
text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa

text_block_list.text: I have been entrusted with the management of the Archive. If you need anything, please tell me.
text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna

text_block_list.text: Right! The rewards have also been entrusted to Tazuna, so I'd like you to receive them from her. That is all from me!
text_block_list.name: Director Akikawa

text_block_list.text: Hehe... By all means, do challenge yourself to create some wonderful memories, okay♪
text_block_list.name: Hayakawa Tazuna
Director Akikawa
text_block_list.text: I also look forward to seeing your magnificent directory when it's finished! Hahaha!
